home.introduction.catchphrase: Let everyone know what you are watching and listening to!
home.cards.heading: Some of our features
home.cards.subheading: These cards will show you our main features to help you understand what {0} can do!
home.cards.extensionsystem.heading: Extension System
home.cards.extensionsystem.description: Our extension has its own extensions! Sounds very strange but it allows you to install different presences for your lovely services!
home.cards.mediacontrols.heading: Media Controls
home.cards.mediacontrols.desciption: Most of our presences provide support for Media Controls. You can skip & pause tracks while using other applications.
home.cards.tabpriority.heading: Tab Priority
home.cards.tabpriority.description: When changing between tabs, our extensions prioritizes the active one.
home.cards.opensource.heading: Open Source
home.cards.opensource.description: You noticed a bug or just want to improve our code? Then you have the opportunity to contribute to our {0} project.
